CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 20, 1957, pg. A15, reads: "YWCA Week - The YWCA Sewing Club will celebrate YMCA Week, April 21-28, together with other groups stemming from the vast resources of the national association. Pictured are member of the North Side 'YW' sewing class which typified the 'Y's' interracial and interfaith philosophy.  Left to right are Elmida Gayda, Mary Lothrop, Miss Agnes Sharpe, teacher; Myrtle McCaskill and Stephanie Tolkacevic. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Northside YWCA sewing class members from left: Elmida Gayda, Mary Lothrop, Agnes Sharpe, Myrtle McCaskill, and Stephanie Tolkacevic, working on sewing projects, another version
